code: import React from'react';import StudentSidebar from'./StudentSidebar';import LecturerSidebar from'./LecturerSidebar';import PrincipalLecturerSidebar from'./PrincipalLecturerSidebar';import ProgramLeaderSidebar from'./ProgramLeaderSidebar';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Sidebar=_ref=>{let{userRole,activeSection,setActiveSection}=_ref;const renderSidebar=()=>{switch(userRole){case'student':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StudentSidebar,{activeSection:activeSection,setActiveSection:setActiveSection});case'lecturer':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LecturerSidebar,{activeSection:activeSection,setActiveSection:setActiveSection});case'principal_lecturer':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PrincipalLecturerSidebar,{activeSection:activeSection,setActiveSection:setActiveSection});case'program_leader':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProgramLeaderSidebar,{activeSection:activeSection,setActiveSection:setActiveSection});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(StudentSidebar,{activeSection:activeSection,setActiveSection:setActiveSection});}};return renderSidebar();};export default Sidebar;
